meanings.definition: To clean or rinse with a syringe.
meanings.sent1: She was syringing the wound gently to remove any dirt.
meanings.sent2: The nurse was syringing the patient's ear to remove excess wax.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the vet was syringing its ear as a strange form of petting.
meanings.sent4: The gardener was syringing water onto the delicate flowers with precision.
meanings.sent5: The sound of syringing water into the vase was oddly soothing.

meanings.definition: The act of cleaning or rinsing with a syringe.
meanings.sent1: The syringing of the wound was done carefully to avoid any infections.
meanings.sent2: She learned the proper technique for ear syringing during her medical training.
meanings.sent3: The syringing of the fountain in the park became a tourist attraction.
meanings.sent4: The syringing of the pipes with water revealed a hidden leak.
meanings.sent5: The syringing of the syringe itself was necessary to maintain cleanliness.
